steps.title: Additional Rules - Saga
steps.text: The [[Saga]] keyword indicates that an encounter card effect will alter the narrative of the campaign, allowing the players to write their own saga. Successful saga actions will yield experience and other rewards, but everything has a cost…

steps.title: Recommended Listening
steps.text: I have compiled a soundtrack of albums by Icelandic musicians that fit the mood of each act in the campaign:

bullets.text: II. Sigur Rós – Route One, Variations on Darkness
III. Jóhann Jóhannsson – Last and First Men, Sicario, Arrival
